author: FOX Sports Midwest
title: FSMW Blues announcer John Kelly tests positive for COVID-19
description: John Kelly, the play-by-play voice of the St. Louis Blues on FOX Sports Midwest, has tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
content:
FOX Sports Midwest and the St. Louis Blues have confirmed that play-by-play announcer John Kelly has tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
Kelly has been in self-quarantine since March 13 and will remain there for a while longer. He told Blues radio play-b… [+712 chars]
